block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is the Space Shuttle aka Orbiter design by Toshikazu Kawasaki. The orbiter was one of my favorite space craft growing up. I've actually seen and touch the orbiter on the NASA Kennedy Launch site . When I saw this model, I really wanted to learn how to fold it and share with you on YouTube. Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel
